item.text: Now very early on the first day of the week, while it was still dark, Mary Magdalene came to the tomb and saw that the stone had been moved away from the entrance.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> she <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="5143" class="">running</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5368" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “They have <st data-num="142" class="">taken</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">we</st> <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> they have <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st> <st data-num="1831">set out</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> were <st data-num="5143" class="">running</st> <st data-num="3674" class="">together</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st> <st data-num="4390" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="5036">faster</st> than <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">reached</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="3879">bent down</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="991" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="3608">strips of linen cloth</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st> there,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3305" class="">but</st> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1525">go in</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, who had been <st data-num="190" class="">following</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2064" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">went</st> right <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>. He <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3608">strips of linen cloth</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st> there,

<st data-num="2532">and</st> the <st data-num="4676" class="">face cloth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> had <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3608" class="">strips of linen cloth</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1794">rolled up</st> in <st data-num="1520" class="">a</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="5565">by itself</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st>, who had <st data-num="1525" class="">reached</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st>, <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>.<n id="1" />
(For they did not yet understand the scripture that Jesus must rise from the dead.)
So the disciples went back to their homes.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>. <st data-num="5613" class="">As</st> she <st data-num="2799" class="">wept</st>, she <st data-num="3879">bent down and looked</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> she <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="2516" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> had been <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.

They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="1135">Woman</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>?” Mary <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="3" /> “They have <st data-num="142" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="142" class="">away</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> they have <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”
When she had said this, she turned around and saw Jesus standing there, but she did not know that it was Jesus.

Jesus said to her, “Woman, why are you weeping? Who are you looking for?” Because she thought he was the gardener, she said to him, “Sir, if you have carried him away, tell me where you have put him, and I will take him.”
Jesus said to her, “Mary.” She turned and said to him in Aramaic, “Rabboni” (which means “Teacher”).
Jesus replied,<n id="1" /> “Do not touch me, for I have not yet ascended to my Father. Go to my brothers and tell them, ‘I am ascending to my Father and your Father, to my God and your God.’”
Mary Magdalene came and informed the disciples, “I have seen the Lord!” And she told them what Jesus had said to her.

On the evening of that day, the first day of the week, the disciples had gathered together and locked the doors of the place because they were afraid of the Jewish leaders. Jesus came and stood among them and said to them, “Peace be with you.”

When he had <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="1166" class="">showed</st> <st data-num="846">them</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="4125" class="">side</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoiced</st> when they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>, “<st data-num="1515">Peace</st> be with <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="2531">Just as</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> has <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2504">I also</st> <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> after he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="1720" class="">breathed</st> on them <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2983">Receive</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.<n id="2" />
If you forgive anyone’s sins, they are forgiven; if you retain anyone’s sins, they are retained.”
Now Thomas (called Didymus), one of the Twelve, was not with them when Jesus came.

The other disciples told him, “We have seen the Lord!” But he replied, “Unless I see the wounds from the nails in his hands, and put my finger into the wounds from the nails, and put my hand into his side, I will never believe it!”
Eight days later the disciples were again together in the house, and Thomas was with them. Although the doors were locked, Jesus came and stood among them and said, “Peace be with you!”

<st data-num="1534" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="2381" class="">Thomas</st>, “<st data-num="5342" class="">Put</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1147">finger</st> <st data-num="5602">here</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="1492">examine</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>. <st data-num="5342" class="">Extend</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="906">put</st> it<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4125" class="">side</st>. Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">continue</st> in your <st data-num="571" class="">unbelief</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">believe</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2381" class="">Thomas</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!”<n id="2" />
Jesus said to him, “Have you believed because you have seen me? Blessed are the people who have not seen and yet have believed.”
Now Jesus performed many other miraculous signs in the presence of the disciples, which are not recorded in this book.
But these are recorded so that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God, and that by believing you may have life in his name.
